title: Higher rank than last season in placement?
body:
just wanted to ask
if my last season is gold 1 100 lp
but my mmr is plat 1+ ( since im a diamond v player on s5 but i banned the account myself coz it got hacked ) and im sure i'd do well in my placements 
is it possible to get a higher rank than gold 1 in placement this season, depending on my 10 games in placements ? Lets say, i do well in all placements and I got 8 wins 2 loses
is it possible to instantly jump to plat , or will it stay lower than gold 1 
since gaining a higher rank in placement than your last season rank is possible

thanks{{champion:39}}

replies.body: Yeap, it's completely possible to get placed higher than you ended last season. It happened to these guys [here](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/ZmXXeh4W-placedhigher-than-i-ended-last-season). But it completely depends on what games you win, and the MMR of the players in those games. Just winning 8/10 placements doesn't guarantee anything.

yea i mean i'd do good too on my placements haha 
thank you :) i thought riot would remove the mmr stuff and still force and give u lower rank
I just got placed in to gold 4 in flex and I was barely gold 5 last season. Won 5 out of 10 placement games.
